verses.verse: Then God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up to Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and live <S%H3427><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> who appeared <S%H7200><s%> to you when you fled <S%H1272><s%> from your brother <S%H251><s%> Esau. <S%H6215><s%>"

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his household <S%H1004><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were with him, "Put <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> the foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are among <S%H8432><s%> you, and purify <S%H2891><s%> yourselves, and change <S%H2498><s%> your garments; <S%H8071><s%>

and let us arise <S%H6965><s%> and go <S%H5927><s%> up to Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and I will make <S%H6213><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> who answered <S%H6030><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress, <S%H6869><s%> and has been <S%H1961><s%> with me wherever <S%H1870><s%> <S%H834><s%> I have gone. <S%H1980><s%> "

So they gave <S%H5414><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had, <S%H3027><s%> and the rings <S%H5141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in their ears; <S%H241><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> hid <S%H2934><s%> them under <S%H8478><s%> the oak <S%H424><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was near <S%H5973><s%> Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

As they journeyed, <S%H5265><s%> there was a great <S%H430><s%> terror <S%H2847><s%> upon the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were around <S%H5439><s%> them, and they did not pursue <S%H7291><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Luz <S%H3870><s%> (that is, Bethel <S%H1008><s%>), which <S%H834><s%> is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were with him.

And he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> El-bethel, because <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had revealed <S%H1540><s%> Himself to him, when he fled <S%H1272><s%> from his brother. <S%H251><s%>

Now Deborah, <S%H1683><s%> Rebekah's nurse, <S%H3243><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and she was buried <S%H6912><s%> below <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> Bethel <S%H1008><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the oak; <S%H437><s%> it was named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Allon-bacuth.
Then God <S%H430><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> when he came <S%H935><s%> from Paddan-aram, and He blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Your name <S%H8034><s%> is Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> You shall no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be called <S%H7121><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> But Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be your name. <S%H8034><s%>" Thus He called <S%H7121><s%> him Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> also said <S%H559><s%> to him, "I am God <S%H410><s%> Almighty; <S%H7706><s%> Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply; <S%H7235><s%> A nation <S%H1471><s%> and a company <S%H6951><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H1961><s%> from you, And kings <S%H4428><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from you.

"And the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> it to you, And I will give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to your descendants <S%H2233><s%> after you."
Then God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from him in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> He had spoken <S%H1696><s%> with him.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set <S%H5324><s%> up a pillar <S%H4676><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> He had spoken <S%H1696><s%> with him, a pillar <S%H4676><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> and he poured <S%H5258><s%> out a libation <S%H5262><s%> on it; he also poured <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on it.
So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> with him, Bethel. <S%H1008><s%>

Then they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and when there was still <S%H5750><s%> some <S%H3530><s%> distance <S%H3530><s%> <S%H776><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> to Ephrath, <S%H672><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> began to give <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> and she suffered <S%H7185><s%> severe <S%H7185><s%> labor. <S%H3205><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when she was in severe <S%H7185><s%> labor <S%H3205><s%> that the midwife <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, "Do not fear, <S%H3372><s%> for now <S%H1571><s%> <S%H2088><s%> you have [another] son. <S%H1121><s%>"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about as her soul <S%H5315><s%> was departing <S%H3318><s%> (for she died <S%H4191><s%>), that she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Ben-oni; but his father called <S%H1><s%> him Benjamin. <S%H7121><s%>
So Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> on the way <S%H1870><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%> (that is, Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>).

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set <S%H5324><s%> up a pillar <S%H4676><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> her grave; <S%H6900><s%> that is the pillar <S%H4676><s%> of Rachel's grave <S%H6900><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>
Then Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> on and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1973><s%> the tower <S%H4029><s%> of Eder. <S%H4029><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about while Israel <S%H3478><s%> was dwelling <S%H7931><s%> in that land, <S%H776><s%> that Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> with Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> his father's concubine; <S%H6370><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> [of it.] Now there were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> â€“

the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah: <S%H3812><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Jacob's first-born, then Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Issachar <S%H3485><s%> and Zebulun; <S%H2074><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel: <S%H7354><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> and Benjamin; <S%H1144><s%>
and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> Rachel's maid: <S%H8198><s%> Dan <S%H1835><s%> and Naphtali; <S%H5321><s%>

and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> Leah's maid: <S%H8198><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%> and Asher. <S%H836><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Paddan-aram.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to his father Isaac <S%H1><s%> at Mamre <S%H3327><s%> of Kiriath-arba (that is, Hebron <S%H4471><s%>), where <S%H2275><s%> <S%H834><s%> Abraham <S%H8033><s%> and Isaac <S%H85><s%> had sojourned. <S%H3327><s%>
Now the days <S%H3117><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> were one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and eighty <S%H8084><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> breathed <S%H1478><s%> his last <S%H1478><s%> and died, <S%H4191><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people, <S%H9415><s%> an old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H2205><s%> of ripe <S%H7649><s%> age; <S%H3117><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> him.
